alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 4:05AM CST until February 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Coldwater River near Sarah For the Coldwater River...including Sarah...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Extensive flooding is occurring near Marks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
